dublin_core.dcvalue: This report describes the April 26 2013 Deep Dive workshop hosted by the mHealth Working group on the development of mobile health information including messages involving text voice and images for clients The meeting objectives were to share information on various types of mobile health messaging in current use share best practices for the design of mobile health content and acquire hands on experience with the best practices for mobile health messaging Speakers included Peggy D Adamo and Adam Slote USAID Stephen Rahaim Abt Associates Sarah Shannon Hesperian Nand Wadhwani The Mother and Child Health and Education Trust Kelly L Engle FHI 360 Kirsten Gagnaire Mobile Alliance for Maternal Action MAMA Nandita Kapadia Kundu Johns Hopkins University Center for Communication Programs JHU CCP and Mariann Hensley and Carrie Miller Catholic Relief Services There were two workshop rotations and the first one included FHI 360 Kelly L Engle and Christine Lasway Role Model StoryMobile Alliance for Maternal Action MAMA Kirsten Gagnaire and Brooke Cutler MAMA and Carolyn Florey USAID SMS messagesJohns Hopkins University Center for Communication Programs JHU CCP James Bon Tempo and Heidi Good Boncana Storyboarding for mobile photofilms Then there was a second workshop rotation FHI 360 Kelly L Engle and Christine Lasway Data collectionMobile Alliance for Maternal Action MAMA Kirsten Gagnaire and Brooke Cutler MAMA and Carolyn Florey USAID Integrated Voice Recording IVR The report also includes mobile health content resources
Meeting Report Deep Dive: Developing Mobile Content for Clients, April 26, 2013
